input.sentences: there was quite a crowd at the border checkpoint .
people lined up to enter another country .
the crowd was pleasant and talkative .
some of the local boys joked and laughed .
this local boy offered to hold out place in line so we could get some water .
output.sentences: The refugees were eager to get into the safe place.
People were happy to get there.
There were friends and family who joked with each other.
A young boy was happy to pose for a photo.
